channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 00:41 Flowing anxiety in Zaporizhzhya region. Find out, anxiety continues in:- Vasylivsky district
item.description: 🟡 00:41 Flowing anxiety in Zaporizhzhya region. Find out, anxiety continues in:- Vasylivsky district#Zaporizhzhia_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 23:14 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovsk district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol.
item.description: 🟡 23:14 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovsk district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
